post:
Windows™ Server VPS hosting provides specific options not available on our LINUX hosting platforms, We are now providing
cheapest Windows VPS servers with 2003, 2008 and 2012 in Web, Standard and Enterprise Edition. All Windows VPS servers
come with remote desktop (RDP) enabled. These are hosted on enterprise grade multi-core Hardware with a minimum
of 32/16GB RAM with raid-10 protected storage and offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee. Windows VPS servers are available in USA.
You can choose to have MSSQL 2008 and WebsitePanel pre-installed on order form., with prices starting at only $16.95 per month.

We Accept Payza (Alertpay), Moneybookers (Skrill) and Perfect Money as payment methods. Users from all countries are accepted. If you have any questions please feel free to submit a sales ticket with our sales department.


OVERVIEW:

Windows 2003, 2008 and 2012 (in both 32Bit and 64Bit)
MSSQL 2008 with all windows 2003, 2008 and 2012 servers (FREE)
WebSitePanel Panel with all windows 2003, 2008 and windows 2012 servers (FREE)
Remote Desktop (RDP) is Enabled on setup
Free Unlimited Manual Reboots
Free Unlimited OS Re-installs
Free Unlimited Version Changes
Free Web Site Panel Control Panel
Full Administrative Access (No Cache)
1-Click Upgrades
There are no CONTRACTS

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: How Long does it take to setup a Windows VPS Server?
Ans: On average, less than 6 hours since you ordered your Windows VPS; however we do not take more than 24 hours.

Q: I am looking for Linux VPS plateform instead Windows VPS, do you offer Linux VPS?
Ans: Yes, we do. Please visit our website to check Linux VPS or go directly by Linux VPS Servers.

Q: My order keeps getting denied, WHY?
Ans: We have a fraud checking system in place for all orders. To ensure that your order does not get automatically denied by our system, please make sure you enter all client details correctly including name, phone number and area code, and addresses. Our fraud checking system takes into account many factors such as your IP, postal code, hostname and ISP, if you're going through a proxy or not, etc. Certain orders will be checked by automated phone call verification. Highly possible fraudulent orders are declined automatically. If you're having trouble due to this, please contact our sales department directly.

Q: Do you offer 24/7 support?
Ans: Of course we do! We find 24/7 to be absolutely necessary to any online business and it should be a standard for this industry.

Q: What payment methods do you support?
1. Payza (Formely Alertpay)
2. Moneybookers (Skrill)
3. PerfectMoney
